original_text: Do not make any agreements with those people in the land where you are going. If you become their friends, they would teach you to do wrong things.
korean_text: 너는 스스로 삼가 네가 들어가는 땅의 주민과 언약을 세우지 말라 그것이 너희에게 올무가 될까 하노라

sentences.original_text: Do not make any agreements with those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들과 어떤 계약도 맺지 말라

sentences.original_text: in the land where you are going
